title: Mage Hand
content:
makes it possible for almost any build to assist with party support. Mage Hand is also available on all arcane spellcasters' spell lists, which in most cases makes it the sole "healing" spell in their repertoire. Mage Hand can now be summoned even while a summoned familiar is active.

Invisibility is broken when attacking. BUG: If Mage Hand is summoned within range of allied See Invisibility effects, it will force the invisible Mage Hand to make a saving throw to avoid being revealed the moment
